item.description:
译文简介

中国以2350亿美元的国防预算，已经成功打造出世界上最大的海军舰队，研发出了尖端的高超音速导弹，隐形轰炸机，以及真正能飞的第六代战斗机。而与此同时，美国却向五角大楼这个黑洞投入了9680亿美元。

正文翻译


William Huo
The U.S. spends $968B on defense,4x more than China,yet it’s losing the arms race in every category. Biggest navy? China. Hypersonics? China. 6th-gen fighter? China. The Pentagon is a trillion-dollar scam. Here’s why.

美国的国防开支高达9680亿美元，这一数字是中国的4倍多，然而，它在每一个类别的军备竞赛中都输掉了。谁是最大的海军？中国。高超音速导弹谁最强？中国。谁有第六代战斗机？还是中国。五角大楼简直就是一个万亿美元级别的大骗局，原因如下。

William Huo
China’s $235B defense budget has built the world’s largest navy, cutting-edge hypersonic missiles, stealth bombers, and a 6th-gen fighter that actually flies. Meanwhile, the U.S. throws $968B into a Pentagon black hole.

中国以2350亿美元的国防预算，已经成功打造出世界上最大的海军舰队，研发出了尖端的高超音速导弹，隐形轰炸机，以及真正能飞的第六代战斗机。而与此同时，美国却向五角大楼这个黑洞投入了9680亿美元。

评论翻译

评论内容：

Kuro Usagi
All of the USA’s ships are modern. The PLAN has modern ships. But also has really old ships as well. The PLAN also has many coastal warships, while all of the USN’s warships are ocean going. If we consider ocean going vs ocean going, China has about 250 ships to USA’s 300.

美国所有的军舰都是现代化的。而中国海军虽然也有现代化的舰艇，但也有一些非常老旧的船只。此外，中国海军还有很多沿海战舰，而美国海军的所有军舰都是远洋战舰。如果我们只考虑远洋战舰之间的对比的话，中国大约只有250艘战舰，而美国则有300艘。

jon
China could have 2000 warships. Utterly irrelevant.

中国可能有2000艘军舰，但这完全无关紧要。

Bootleg Football
Quality over quantity buddy. There’s a reason everytime western equipment has met numerically superior eastern stuff, the western equipment wins.

兄弟，质量比数量更重要。每次西方装备遇到数量上占优势的东方装备时，西方装备总能胜出，这是有原因的。

Russr
I don't think fishing trawlers count as naval warships....

我不认为拖网渔船算得上是海军军舰。

VeilofIgnorance
Nobody takes China’s navy seriously. Their aircraft carriers are cargo ships with runways.

没有人会把中国海军放在眼里，他们的航空母舰只不过是带跑道的货船罢了。

Karol W
Technology stolen from US companies.

从美国公司偷来的技术。
原创翻译：龙腾网 https://www.ltaaa.cn 转载请注明出处


Praveen Deshmukh
All it takes is one hypersonic like Oreshnik to sink a carrier whether it be Russian or Chinese

无论是俄罗斯还是中国的航母，只需要一颗像“榛树” 这样的高超音速导弹就能击沉。

Why Stop Now
It won’t hit they’re inaccurate and won’t hit a moving carrier at all

它打不到目标，它们还不够精准，根本打不到移动中的航母了。

Bonkador
China won't let anyone know about their shortcomings and flaws.

中国绝不会让任何人知道他们的缺点和缺陷。

Navy Jack
China‘s sortie rate is 20 percent of the USN’s during the day and five percent of the USN’s at night.

中国白天的出动率是美国海军的20%，夜间的出动率仅为美国海军的5%。

J. G. Wentworth
You people can't even make a submarine

你们连潜水艇都造不出来。

William Huo
The J-20 Mighty Dragon is in mass production, while the F-35 remains a flying money pit. China’s H-20 stealth bomber is nearing deployment, while the U.S. B-21 is still in testing. China builds, the U.S. burns cash.

歼-20威龙战斗机已经开始批量生产，而F-35仍然是一个飞行的钱坑。中国的轰-20隐形轰炸机马上就要部署了，而美国的B-21轰炸机还在测试阶段。中国在搞建设，美国在烧钱。
原创翻译：龙腾网 https://www.ltaaa.cn 转载请注明出处


MaZing
H-20 stealth Bomber is nearing deployment? Wow

轰20隐形轰炸机真的快要部署了吗？哇！

TransitTyrant
No he’s lying, if it was ready for deployment you’d see training flights.

不，他在撒谎。如果已经准备好部署，你应该会看到训练飞行。

Why Stop Now
The j20 has the radar signatura of a fucking house.

歼-20的雷达信号跟房子的雷达信号差不多大。

Watson Ladd
Flying money pit? The flyaway cost for the F-35 is incredibly low

飞行的钱坑？F-35的飞行成本低得令人咋舌！

John Lenny
The J-20 is a 5th Gen, not 6th Gen. The H-20 is just a Bomber, not a Stealth Bomber. Meanwhile Lockheed has made 1100+ F-35s while China has only produced 250 J-20s.

歼-20算是第五代战斗机，不是第六代战斗机。轰-20只是一架轰炸机，而不是隐形轰炸机。与此同时，洛克希德公司已经生产了1100多架F-35战斗机，而中国只生产了250架歼-20。

Bootleg Football
Wrong the B-21 has been approved for mass production

错，B-21已获准批量生产了。

William Huo
China has already flown its 6th-gen fighter while the U.S. NGAD is still a PowerPoint presentation. Meanwhile, the Pentagon’s F-35 program alone will cost $1.7 trillion—more than China’s entire military spending for 7 years.

中国已经试飞了第六代战斗机，而美国的NGAD（下一代空中优势）第六代战斗机项目仍然只是一个ppt演示文稿而已。与此同时，仅五角大楼的F-35项目，就预计要花费1.7万亿美元，这一数字已经超过中国7年的全部军费开支。

Astro Novis
We literally flew our 6th Gen fighter in 2018.

我们在2018年就试飞过我们的第六代战斗机了。

Dillon O'Malley
The F-35 1.7 Trillion figure is for expected fielding of 2,456 expected platforms for 40+ years.

F-35 1.7万亿美元的数字，是在40多年内预计部署2456个平台的费用。

Michael T Megois
Your 6th gen fighter is literally the f-16 XL that we never built….

你们的第六代战斗机，其实就是我们从未制造过的F-16 XL。

F_Lestari
If the price of each item in the U.S. is 10 times that in China, then China's military budget is larger than the U.S.

如果美国每件商品的价格都是中国的10倍，那么中国的军事预算就要比美国大得多。

jugtown
chinas 5th gen fighter is a joke and u don’t have a stealth bomber

中国的第五代战斗机简直就是个笑话，你们根本没有隐形轰炸机。

Alph Picasso
And around 70% of all F35s are not even airworthy which was disclosed in a congressional hearinf a year or two ago.

大约70%的f35战斗机甚至没有处于适航状态，这是一两年前国会听证会上披露出来的信息。

JB
USA will propagandise then that China and Russia stole US’s technology. They’ll keep on repeating this lies over and over so that every imbecile in USA, uk, and eu has it hardwired in their walnut sized brain and they further echo it at every opportunity.

到时候美国就会宣传中国和俄罗斯偷了美国的技术。他们会一遍又一遍地重复这个谎言，这样美国、英国以及欧盟的每一个白痴都会把它深深刻在他们核桃大小的脑子里，他们一有机会就进一步附和这一观点。

Astro Novis
They did. In fact, we GAVE them the tech to build Nuclear Reactors on Boats just so they wouldn't blow themselves up and cause more nuclear disasters.

他们做到了。实际上，我们把在船上建造核反应堆的技术给了他们，这样他们就不会把自己炸飞，造成更多的核灾难。

Bootleg Football
What proof have we been shown that this plane is *actually* 6th gen? What features? What has it done? Or is that just what the Chinese claim?

我们有什么证据证明这架飞机真的是第六代战斗机？它有什么独特之处？它做了什么？还是说这只是中国人的一面之词？

FBI's Goodest Guy
That plane isn't even a fighter. It's at most a fighter bomber.

那架飞机甚至算不上真正的战斗机，它充其量不过是一架战斗轰炸机。

Why Stop Now
They saw a weird shaped flying thing in the air that’s it.

他们看到空中有一个形状怪异的飞行物，就这样而已。

Starsky Romero
If these Chinese were ahead, they wouldn’t be stealing and copying technology.

如果这些中国人真的领先，他们就不会去窃取和复制别人的技术了。

William Huo
The U.S. military-industrial complex is a legalized grift operation. The Pentagon has never passed an audit, billions go “unaccounted,” and contractors like Lockheed & Raytheon overcharge for weapons that don’t even work.

美国的军工复合体是一种合法的诈骗企业，五角大楼从来没有通过审计，数十亿美元“下落不明”，像洛克希德、雷神这样的承包商甚至对那些根本不管用的武器收取过高的费用。

Why Stop Now
All this and your military has never been tested or used any of its in actual combat

所有这一切，你们的军队从来没有在实战中测试过或使用过。

William Huo
China is integrating AI-powered drone swarms and future warfighting systems, while the U.S. struggles to keep its bloated logistics network running. China is preparing for the future; the U.S. is preparing for defense contractor bonuses.

中国正在积极整合人工智能驱动的无人机群，以及未来的作战系统，而美国却在努力维持其臃肿的物流网络的运转。中国正在为未来做准备；而美国却在为国防承包商的奖金做准备。

William Huo
Despite spending 4x more, the U.S. is in a position where it cannot win a war in the Pacific and is losing its ability to project power globally. Pentagon waste, corruption, and bloat have ended U.S. military dominance.

尽管国防开支是中国的4倍多，但美国却处于无法赢得太平洋战争的境地，而且正在逐渐丧失全球投送力量的能力。五角大楼的浪费、腐败和机构臃肿，已经终结了美国的军事主导地位。

jugtown
4 American attack subs could defeat the entire Chinese navy

4艘美国攻击潜艇就能击败整个中国海军。

Bootleg Football
Please explain why, with 11 nuclear powered aircraft carrier when China has 2, we would lose a war?

请解释一下，美国有11艘核动力航母，而中国只有2艘，我们为什么会输掉一场战争？

William Huo
The era of U.S. military supremacy is over—not because of China’s budget, but because the Pentagon is a trillion-dollar sinkhole run by lobbyists and contractors who care more about profits than warfighting capability.

美国军事霸权的时代已经结束了，并不是因为中国的预算问题，而是因为五角大楼是一个由游说者和承包商经营的万亿美元的大坑，这些人更关心的是利润，而不是作战能力。

Asher
USA is repeating all mistakes of the USSR and is going to fall apart for exactly same reasons: inefficient bloated bureacracy, moral bankruptcy, bloated military

美国正在重复苏联犯下的所有错误，并且会因为完全相同的原因而分崩离析：效率低下，臃肿的官僚机构；道德沦丧，臃肿的军队。

SayNo
Your aircraft carrier can do nothing, F35 combat radius 1100 km, China YJ21 hypersonic anti-ship missile range 1500 km, your aircraft carrier must be more than 1500 km away from the Chinese navy, no threat

你们的航母什么都做不了，F35的作战半径才1100公里，而中国鹰击21高超音速反舰导弹的射程有1500公里，这就意味着你们的航母必须与中国海军保持 1500 公里以上的距离，才能免受威胁。

JB
Pentagon is a black hole with zero accountability like NED, USAID etc

五角大楼就像NED(美国国家民主基金会)、USAID(美国国际开发署)等机构一样，是一个缺乏问责制的黑洞。
原创翻译：龙腾网 https://www.ltaaa.cn 转载请注明出处


Ahairabe
How much is the median salary+benefits of a Chinese soldier vs. a US soldier?

你知道中国士兵与美国士兵的工资加福利的中位数是多少吗？

Keith Ridgewell
It’s your taxes paying for all the bases all around the world. Whilst China builds roads and bridges the USA builds military bases and points a gun

都是靠你们的税收来为遍布世界各地的所有军事基地买单，当中国在修建道路和桥梁的时候，美国却在修建军事基地，还拿枪指着他们。

Cornelius_mack
China dont have military bases to maintain all over the world lol

中国在世界各地没有军事基地需要维护，哈哈。
原创翻译：龙腾网 https://www.ltaaa.cn 转载请注明出处


David Winter
China has the largest Navy in the world with 730 vessels. China has the largest Army in the world with over 2 million personnel.

中国有世界上最大的海军，有730艘舰艇。中国还有世界上最大的军队，有200多万人。

PE Psyop
They count every Chinese boat as a naval vessel. Fishing boats included. Their soldiers are widely untrained in comparison to American forces. Their ground infantry hasn’t seen combat since 1979.

包括渔船在内，他们把每一艘中国船只都算作海军舰艇。与美国军队相比，他们的士兵普遍缺乏训练。自1979年以来，他们的地面部队就没有参加过任何实战。

Range videos have also come out showing their rounds hitting paper targets at unpredictable angles leading some to question of their rifle barrels are even properly manufactured. Their capabilities are not close to ours.

靶场的视频也显示，他们射出的子弹以飘忽不定的角度击中纸靶，这引发了一些人对他们的步枪枪管是否制造得当的质疑。他们的能力与我们相去甚远。

shobo52617781
Yes because during manufacture the regulations dictate that you have to conform to military standard

是的，因为在制造过程中，法规规定,你必须符合军用标准。

Ariodante
You're an idiot who can't read Chinese and knows nothing about China. Your cope is ridiculous.

你真的是个不懂中文的白痴，你对中国一无所知。你的应对方式太荒谬了。

David Pirouet
The United States up until recently as well has shown itself totally incapable of dealing with disasters being natural man-made and those are on a pitifully small scale compared with the sort of damage even one nuclear weapon could do, hopefully they'll now be quicker to respond!

直到最近，美国也显示出自己完全没有能力应对自然灾害或人为灾难，与一枚核武器所能造成的破坏相比，这些灾难的规模简直是微不足道。希望他们现在能更迅速地做出反应。
原创翻译：龙腾网 https://www.ltaaa.cn 转载请注明出处


David Pirouet
The same can be true for most of the other militaries of the world generally speaking they are only really suited to defending their borders capability but in a real serious fallout I suspect they would be a nuclear war rather than conventional!

世界上其他大多数军队也是这样，一般来说，他们真的只有适合保卫自己边界的能力，但在面对真正严重的后果时，我怀疑他们会打一场核战争，而不是常规战争。

Screaming cat
China isn't a blue water navy they don't have the ability to project across the globe during a combat scenario, at least for now

中国海军并不是一支蓝水海军，他们没有能力在战斗场景中向全球范围内投送力量，至少目前是这样。

SayGexxer
The US has nuclear aircraft carriers.

美国有核动力航空母舰。
原创翻译：龙腾网 https://www.ltaaa.cn 转载请注明出处


zbjgns
Navy and Air force, because of the US first mover advantage, I admit that the US is the strongest. But the army and logistics? Are you kidding me?

至于海军和空军，由于美国有先发优势，我承认美国确实是最强的。但是在陆军和后勤方面呢？你是在开玩笑吗？
原创翻译：龙腾网 https://www.ltaaa.cn 转载请注明出处


War for the West
Be clear, Chinese stealth and mil aircrafts in general are a joke compared to U.S. designed/built military aircraft. Keep in mind that C airlines don't want to buy Chinese manufactured airliners due to huge quality problems.

要明确的是，与美国设计、制造的军用飞机相比，总体上来看，C产的隐形飞机和军用飞机简直就是个笑话。请记住，由于严重的质量问题，就连中国航空公司都不愿意购买中国制造的客机。

Not saying China isn't a threat, nor that the problems with the Defense industry aren't real. But to see this as merely corruption and to pretend China is racing ahead of us is to announce you are an idiot who actually knows nothing about how all this works.

这并不是说中国不是威胁，也不是说国防工业的问题不存在。但要是你认为这只不过是腐败现象，还假装中国跑在美国前面，那就相当于承认你自己是一个白痴，实际上你对这一切是如何运作的一无所知。

Common
Yes it’s a mess and there’s a lot of waste & fraud.

是的，这是一个烂摊子，而且存在大量的浪费和欺诈行为。

Common
And China’s stated cost is not accurate, because their military is smartly lixed to their civilian manufacturing activities which they supported with subsidies. An examples is how they designed their civilian ship building capabilities to be military compatible.

中国公布的成本数据是不准确的，因为他们的军用与民用制造活动巧妙地结合在一起，他们还通过补贴来扶持民用制造活动。有一个例子是，他们是如何设计民用造船能力，以使其兼顾军事需求的。

Graeme Lawton
the new "narrative" emerging from the US is that the US has been some benevolent uncle protecting EU at its own expense. spent "on" Europe, translation: spent "upholding US hegemony to project power and thus maintain the USD way above its real value for decades"

从美国浮现出来的新的“叙事”是，一直以来，美国都是一个仁慈的大叔，为了保护欧盟而自掏腰包，把钱花在了欧洲。其实翻译过来就是：把钱花在“维护美国霸权以便投射力量，从而让美元在几十年内保持远高于其实际价值的水平。”上。

Tim Fountain
And without it, Europe (and Australia, South Korea, Japan, etc) might buy the best equipment for the best price rather than often under-spec US equipment by default.

如果没有它的存在，欧洲（以及澳大利亚、韩国、日本等）可能会以最划算的价格买到最好的设备，而不是默认情况下，买到通常是规格不高的美国设备。

Qomolangma
And most of these "spending on Europe" goes back to American military complex on overpriced weapons.

而这些“花在欧洲的钱”中的大部分又回到了美国军工复合体的高价武器上。

Graeme Lawton
indeed and is further "subsidized" by the EU purchase of US weapons systems; around 80% of NATO's combat aircraft are U.S.-made for example

确实如此，而且还得到了欧盟采购美国武器系统的进一步“补贴”；比如说，北约大约80%的作战飞机都是美国制造的。

exposing hypocrisy
the only thing holding back nazies in europe and jihadists in ME is America. saud family does not pay 1 trillion in protection money for nothing.

唯一能遏制欧洲纳粹分子和中东圣战分子的就是美国。沙特家族可不会平白无故的支付1万亿美元的保护费。

Stop Socialist
We need to rethink our defense strategy and stop wasting taxpayer dollars on bureaucratic nonsense, it's time for a change in the Pentagon. The fact that China is surpassing us in every category is unacceptable, we must prioritize innovation and efficiency over entrenched interests.

我们必须重新审视我们的国防战略，不要再把纳税人的钱浪费在官僚主义的废话上了，是时候改变五角大楼了。中国在各个领域都超越了美国的事实是不可接受的，我们必须把创新和效率放在首位，而不是把既得利益放在首位。

Trump's leadership is what we need to get our military back on track, let's support his efforts to drain the swamp and make America strong again.

我们需要特朗普的领导来使我们的军队回到正轨，让我们支持他的努力，排忧解难，让美国再次强盛。

El Huasteco
The only thing you need to fix is you capitalism, that's your problem because its unsustainable for the greedy billionaires economic life style. Economies, that place the needs of its citizens first, will always out perform capitalism in every category including civics.

你们唯一需要解决的是你们的资本主义，这是你们的问题，因为对于贪婪的亿万富翁的经济生活方式来说，它是不可持续的。一个把公民需求放在首位的经济体，在包括公民在内的各个方面都会永远超过资本主义。

正文翻译

item.title: 英国提议西方向乌克兰派遣1万名维和部队 UK proposes Western peacekeeping mission of 10,000 troops in Ukraine
item.description:
译文简介

“欧洲有5亿人口。我们应该有能力建立一支3万人的军队……”

正文翻译

UK proposes Western peacekeeping mission of 10,000 troops in Ukraine

英国提议西方向乌克兰派遣1万名维和部队


(Keir Starmer, Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, speaks during a joint press conference with President Volodymyr Zelensky on Jan. 16, 2025 in Kyiv.)

（2025年1月16日，在基辅，英国首相基尔·斯塔默与总统弗拉基米尔·泽连斯基在联合新闻发布会上发表讲话。）
新闻：

U.K. Prime Minister Keir Starmer presented plans to send 10,000 peacekeeping troops to Ukraine at a high-level virtual summit in London on March 15.

英国首相斯塔默15日在英国伦敦举行的高级别首脑会谈上，提出了向乌克兰派遣1万名维和部队的方案。

The summit, which included 29 international leaders, was organized by the U.K. with the purpose of creating a "coalition of the willing" that could secure Ukraine in the event of a peace deal with Russia.

这次峰会有29位国际领导人参加，由英国组织，目的是建立一个“自愿联盟”，在与俄罗斯达成和平协议的情况下，确保乌克兰的安全。

Starmer's proposed peacekeeping contingent would include around 10,000 troops, mostly provided by the U.K. and France, U.K. military sources told the Sunday Times. Thirty-five countries have agreed to supply the peacekeeping mission with weapons, logistics, and intelligence support.

英国军方消息人士告诉《星期日泰晤士报》，斯塔默提议的维和部队将包括约1万人，主要由英国和法国提供。已有35个国家同意向维和行动提供武器、后勤和情报支持。

The peacekeeping mission will be "a significant force with a significant number of countries providing troops and a much larger group contributing in other ways," a senior government source said.

一位高级政府消息人士表示，维和行动将是“一支重要的部队，由大量国家提供步兵，并以其他方式作出更大的贡献”。

In addition to European nations, Australia, Canada, and New Zealand joined the call, as did NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte.

除欧洲国家外，澳大利亚、加拿大和新西兰以及北约秘书长马克·吕特也加入了这一呼吁。

The proposed force of 10,000 is significantly smaller than the 30,000 troops Starmer reportedly pitched to U.S. President Donald Trump during their White House meeting on Feb. 20.

据报道，斯塔默在2月20日与美国总统唐纳德·特朗普在白宫会晤时提出了3万人的兵力，而拟议中的1万人的兵力远远少于这一数字。

Previously, President Volodymyr Zelensky said that European partners would need to station 100,000 to 150,000 troops on Ukraine's front lines to effectively deter Russia.

此前，总统弗拉基米尔·泽连斯基表示，欧洲伙伴需要在乌克兰前线部署10万至15万部队，以有效遏制俄罗斯。

U.K. defense sources told the Guardian on Feb. 18 that a much smaller European-led peacekeeping force could instead rely on intelligence, surveillance, and long-range monitoring to enforce a ceasefire.

英国国防部消息人士2月18日对《卫报》表示，由欧洲领导的规模小得多的维和部队可以依靠情报、监视和远程监控来执行停火。

Following the virtual summit, Starmer announced that "troops on the ground and planes in the sky" would provide security guarantees for Ukraine following a future peace deal.

在这次虚拟峰会之后，斯塔默宣布，“地面部队和空中飞机”将在未来的和平协议后为乌克兰提供安全保障。

The allied coalition will hold a second round of military talks on March 20, Starmer said.

斯塔默说，联盟将于3月20日举行第二轮军事会谈。

While France and the U.K. have been the most vocal about sending troops to Ukraine, some countries, including Italy and Finland, have expressed reservations. Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni attended the summit and vocalized support for Ukraine, but said that Italy does not plan to participate in the proposed peacekeeping force.

虽然法国和英国在向乌克兰出兵的问题上直言不讳，但包括意大利和芬兰在内的一些国家表达了保留意见。意大利总理梅洛尼出席了峰会，并表示支持乌克兰，但表示意大利不打算参加拟议中的维和部队。
原创翻译：龙腾网 https://www.ltaaa.cn 转载请注明出处


The summit followed an eventful week of diplomacy, as Kyiv agreed to a 30-day ceasefire proposed by the U.S. on March 11. While the the Kremlin said it was ready to agree to the U.S.-backed ceasefire, it demanded that Kyiv limit military mobilization and training in addition to the West halting military aid to Ukraine.

这次峰会之前，乌克兰在3月11日同意了美国提出的为期30天的停火协议。虽然克里姆林宫表示准备同意美国支持的停火协议，但它要求基辅限制军事动员和训练，并要求西方停止对乌克兰的军事援助。

U.S. President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin are expected to hold a call this week to discuss the terms of the ceasefire, Trump's Special Envoy Steve Witkoff said on March 16.

特朗普特使史蒂夫·维特科夫3月16日表示，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普和俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京预计将于本周举行电话会议，讨论停火条款。

item.description:
译文简介

网友：我在2024年底/2025年初回到中国时感到非常震惊，整个月北京都是蓝天。这在过去冬季是闻所未闻的，因为以前他们使用燃煤供暖。我听说他们已经改用液化天然气，将工厂迁走，转向更多可再生能源，并且大约一半的汽车是电动车。这种变化令人惊叹。

This was unheard of during winter as they would provide coal powered heating in the past. I was told they have switched to LNG, moved all factories away, switched to more renewable energy and about half of the cars were EVs. IT was an astounding difference to witness.

that's astounding. I remember seeing vloggers making crazy videos about using vacuum to suck up smog to compress it to make bricks back in 2017, now It's like two totally different worlds.

item.title: 历史上最惊奇的艺术品盗窃案——《蒙娜丽莎》失窃案 The Greatest Art Heist In History
item.description:
译文简介

1911年的《蒙娜丽莎》失窃案至今仍是艺术犯罪史上的传奇。谁能想到，一桩罪案竟让这幅画成了世界第一艺术品？这个故事充满悬疑、执念和出人意料的因果。

正文翻译



当时，世界上最著名的艺术作品之一——《蒙娜丽莎》，竟然从巴黎的卢浮宫消失了。
整个事情的经过其实很简单，盗贼是一个名叫温琴佐·佩鲁贾的意大利人，他曾在卢浮宫做过杂工，对博物馆的结构和运作了如指掌。他知道卢浮宫周一是闭馆的，也知道每次到了拍摄展品记录时画作会被取下来。于是，在1911年的一个周日，他伪装成博物馆的工作人员，趁着博物馆空荡荡的时候，把《蒙娜丽莎》从画框里取下来包裹好，直接溜了出去。而且，最令人惊讶的是，当时没有人发现他，连工作中的水管工都没看出来他不是员工，结果还帮忙开了门！
佩鲁贾得手后，成功藏匿了两年之久。整整18小时后，人们才意识到这幅画不见了。警察开始调查，全球范围内掀起了寻找《蒙娜丽莎》的热潮。法国边境被封锁，卢浮宫四周的戒备空前严格，但始终没找到画作。经过两年的追查，警方终于根据一封神秘的信件找到了佩鲁贾的下落——原来他就住在距离卢浮宫两公里远的地方！
这件事看似结束了，但背后的秘密远没有这么简单。几十年后，一位作家揭露了更为复杂的幕后。原来，这起盗窃背后还有一位名叫爱德华多·德·瓦尔费尔诺的艺术伪造专家，他并不单纯是想偷走《蒙娜丽莎》，而是有个更大的阴谋。他计划伪造六幅完美的《蒙娜丽莎》复制品，并将这些画卖给六位美国的富有收藏家。为了让这些买家相信他们买到的是真品，他才雇佣佩鲁贾去盗走原版的画作。这简直像是一个大规模的艺术骗局，背后隐藏的是一个精心策划的商业阴谋和伪造计划，艺术品不仅仅是收藏，也可以成为商业和利益的工具。

item.title: 烦人的智齿 - 为什么人类进化没有淘汰掉它？ Why Do We (Still) Have Wisdom Teeth?
item.description:
译文简介

你有拔过智齿吗？如果有，那你有没有想过，为什么智齿这种东西在人类进化的过程中没有被淘汰？接下来我们就以人类智齿为切入点，探讨其生物学特征、普遍存在问题及其进化起源。

正文翻译



人类口腔中的第三磨牙因其生长阶段晚、空间适应性差且常伴随病理问题，在医学领域被称为智齿。这种特殊的牙齿结构普遍存在于现代人类口腔中，却因其频繁引发阻生、龋齿及邻牙损伤等问题，成为临床牙科最常见的拔除对象。从生物学视角观察，智齿的生长规律具有显著特殊性：其萌发时间通常延迟至个体发育成熟阶段，约在18至25岁间开始突破牙龈，此时人类颌骨发育已基本定型。统计数据表明，超过半数人口至少存在一颗阻生智齿，而98%的阻生病例源自第三磨牙，这种高发率与人类颌骨空间的进化性缩减存在直接关联。
进化生物学研究揭示，智齿作为灵长类动物共有的牙齿结构，在人类早期祖先中曾发挥重要咀嚼功能。黑猩猩、大猩猩等现存类人猿仍保持较宽阔的颌骨结构，其第三磨牙能正常萌发并参与食物研磨。但人类自直立人阶段开始，随着脑容量扩大与颅骨结构改变，颌骨逐渐缩短变窄。这种形态学变化与人类饮食结构的转变形成协同进化关系：烹饪技术的出现使食物趋向软化，降低了对强力咀嚼器官的依赖，颌骨肌肉附着区域随之缩小。在此过程中，第三磨牙的生理空间被持续压缩，最终导致现代人类普遍面临智齿萌发空间不足的困境。
现代人类中约20%个体存在先天缺失部分或全部智齿的现象，这种遗传变异提示该器官正处于进化消退阶段。从进化痕迹理论分析，智齿已从功能性器官转变为痕迹器官，其存在仅反映物种进化历程而非现实生理需求。这种器官退化现象与阑尾的进化轨迹具有相似性，均表现为原始功能的丧失与解剖结构的残留。临床医学实践显示，智齿阻生不仅造成局部炎症与疼痛，更可能引发牙列拥挤、邻牙根吸收等复杂病症，这促使预防性拔除成为现代牙科的常规处置方案。
从生物力学角度观察，智齿萌发时的机械压力可能打破原有牙列平衡，这种生物学特性与人类颌骨容积缩减形成矛盾关系。比较解剖学研究证实，尼安德特人等古人类已显现出颌骨缩小的趋势，但其程度远不及现代人类。这种加速进化现象或与近万年来农业文明带来的饮食精细化密切相关。智齿问题因此成为人类进化过程中形态适应与文化变革相互作用的具体例证，既体现生物器官对环境变迁的滞后性适应，也折射出文明发展对生物体结构的深层影响。
